column2: ENGLISH
column3: FRENCH

column2: Stop Drinking
column3: Fini la boisson

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to abandon [This.GetHerHis] harmful drinking habits.
column3: [This.Get_Le_Title][This.GetTitledFirstName], pélagien zélé, tente d'apprendre à abandonner son penchant pour la boisson qui lui cause tant de souffrances.

column2: Learn to Reject Empty Pleasures
column3: Apprendre à rejeter les plaisirs inutiles

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to reject emply pleasures.
column3: [This.Get_Le_Title][This.GetTitledFirstName], pélagien zélé, tente d'apprendre à rejeter les plaisirs inutiles.

column2: Learn to Abstain from Excesses of the Flesh
column3: Apprendre à s'abstenir des excès de la chair
column6: Aprender a abstenerse de impulsos carnales.

column2: Reject Cruelty

column2: Learn Temperance with Food
column3: Apprendre à modérer son appétit
column6: Aprender a ser moderado con la comida

column2: Learn to Reject the Poison of Greed
column3: Apprendre à rejeter le poison de l'avarice
column4: Lernt, das Gift der Gier abzulehnen
column6: Aprender a rechazar el veneno de la codicia

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to reject the poison that greed brings to the mind.
column3: [This.Get_Le_Title][This.GetTitledFirstName], pélagien zélé, tente d'apprendre à rejeter ce poison de l'esprit qu'est l'avarice.

column2: Learn to Reject Hate
column3: Apprendre à rejeter la haine

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to reject the poison that hate and anger brings to the mind.

column2: Defeat Fear
column3: Vaincre la peur

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to defeat [This.GetHerHis] fear of the world and of the designs of others.
column3: [This.Get_Le_Title][This.GetTitledFirstName], pélagien zélé, tente d'apprendre à vaincre sa peur du monde et des projets d'autrui.
